overview:
“Joe is a proven and results oriented sales leader with over 15 years of experience building highly successful enterprise software sales organizations. In his role as Vice-President, Sales North America, Joe is responsible for the overall management, strategic direction and growth of Panoramaâ€™s direct and technical sales teams.

Prior to joining Panorama Software, Joe served as Director, Financial Services North America with Hyperion Solutions managing revenues in excess of $30M. While at Hyperion Joe earned top Revenue Attainment awards as Hyperionâ€™s North America Sales Manager of the Year in 2000 and North America Sales Director of the Year in 2002. Prior to Hyperion, Joe was a major account sales manager at Microsoft Corporation. Joe has an MBA in Management, Marketing and a BA Marketing Communications from the University of Connecticut.” (Source: Panorama)
